Perform zenith analysis

Source: R/zenith_gsa.R
zenith_gsa-methods.Rd

Perform zenith analysis

zenith_gsa(
  fit,
  geneSets,
  coefs,
  use.ranks = FALSE,
  n_genes_min = 10,
  inter.gene.cor = 0.01,
  progressbar = TRUE,
  ...
)

# S4 method for dreamletResult,GeneSetCollection
zenith_gsa(
  fit,
  geneSets,
  coefs,
  use.ranks = FALSE,
  n_genes_min = 10,
  inter.gene.cor = 0.01,
  progressbar = TRUE,
  ...
)

# S4 method for MArrayLM,GeneSetCollection
zenith_gsa(
  fit,
  geneSets,
  coefs,
  use.ranks = FALSE,
  n_genes_min = 10,
  inter.gene.cor = 0.01,
  progressbar = TRUE,
  ...
)

# S4 method for dreamlet_mash_result,GeneSetCollection
zenith_gsa(
  fit,
  geneSets,
  coefs,
  use.ranks = FALSE,
  n_genes_min = 10,
  inter.gene.cor = 0.01,
  progressbar = TRUE,
  statistic = c("tstatistic", "abs(tstatistic)", "logFC", "abs(logFC)")
)

Arguments

fit

results from dreamlet

geneSets

a list of gene sets

coefs

coefficients to test using topTable(fit, coef=coefs[i])

use.ranks

do a rank-based test TRUE or a parametric test FALSE? default: FALSE

n_genes_min

minumum number of genes in a geneset

inter.gene.cor

if NA, estimate correlation from data. Otherwise, use specified value

progressbar

if TRUE, show progress bar

...

other arguments

statistic

which statistic to use

Value

data.frame of results for each gene set and cell type

Examples

library(muscat)
library(SingleCellExperiment)

data(example_sce)

# create pseudobulk for each sample and cell cluster
pb <- aggregateToPseudoBulk(example_sce, 
   assay = "counts",    
   cluster_id = 'cluster_id', 
   sample_id = 'sample_id',
   verbose=FALSE)

# voom-style normalization
res.proc = processAssays( pb, ~ group_id)
#>   B cells...
#> 0.021 secs
#>   CD14+ Monocytes...
#> 0.02 secs
#>   CD4 T cells...
#> 0.021 secs
#>   CD8 T cells...
#> 0.022 secs
#>   FCGR3A+ Monocytes...
#> 0.021 secs

# Differential expression analysis within each assay,
# evaluated on the voom normalized data 
res.dl = dreamlet( res.proc, ~ group_id)
#>   B cells...
#> 0.04 secs
#>   CD14+ Monocytes...
#> 0.06 secs
#>   CD4 T cells...
#> 0.046 secs
#>   CD8 T cells...
#> 0.022 secs
#>   FCGR3A+ Monocytes...
#> 0.056 secs
#> 

# Load Gene Ontology database 
# use gene 'SYMBOL', or 'ENSEMBL' id
# use get_MSigDB() to load MSigDB
library(zenith)
go.gs = get_GeneOntology("CC", to="SYMBOL")
#> Using cached version from 2022-02-18 20:07:31
   
# Run zenith gene set analysis on result of dreamlet
res_zenith = zenith_gsa(res.dl, go.gs, 'group_idstim' )

# for each cell type select 3 genesets with largest t-statistic
# and 1 geneset with the lowest
# Grey boxes indicate the gene set could not be evaluted because
#    to few genes were represented
plotZenithResults(res_zenith, 3, 1)
